dcterms:creator: T. Rateke
K. A. Justen
A. von Wangenheim
dcterms:description: The RTK classification dataset includes images of road surfaces categorized into three types: asphalt, concrete, and unpaved, with conditions labeled as good, regular, and bad for asphalt, and regular and bad for concrete and unpaved roads.
dcterms:title: RTK classification dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts

R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The CityScapes dataset is used for training segmentation models, focusing on urban scene understanding with annotated images for road extraction.
dcterms:title: CityScapes
